page.title: 11LOADS OF RUBBISH COVENTRY SW
page.content: Rubbish is an important problem in a large city like Coventry in 1985. 65,000 tons of household rubbish alone is collected every year by a fleet of refuse lorries & teams of refuse collectors.Much of it is buried in {land fill sites}which are then covered with soil and grassed over to make attractive parkland. On the London Rd.we have an enormous {incinerator plant}which burns vast quantities of rubbish.The heat from the furnace is sold to a nearby factory. We now have a{bottle bank}at Whitley waste disposal site.Instead of throwing away our used bottles we can put them into a specially designed skip.The glass is sold and recycled. A{can bank}is a possibility in the future.
